Hook.text: Did you sing in the shower this morning?
You should talk to people in the elevator.
Would you befriend an elf?
Do you sometimes still check for monsters under the bed?
Did you think your toys were alive when you were little?
Are you a morning person or are you a coffee person?

Have you ever fallen asleep at your desk?

Have you ever stepped on a snail?

That person. Across the room. With the eyes. Wink at them.
What is your weirdest habit?
Keep calm and have a pillow fight.
Babies are like drunk people.
Ever told a secret you weren’t supposed to?
Do your parents still embarrass you?

Sex alleviates tension.
36 questions is a recipe for falling in love with a stranger.

It’s okay to hate Mondays.
